parameters.name: Feature
parameters.description: Array of size NumRefs containing the names of features that include auxiliary external references

parameters.name: ExternalFileName
parameters.description: Array of size NumRefs containing the names of the auxiliary external files

title: IModelDoc2.IListAuxiliaryExternalFileReferences
description: Gets the names of auxiliary external file references for this model.
signature:
void IListAuxiliaryExternalFileReferences( 
   System.Int32
NumRefs
,
   out System.String
Feature
,
   out System.String
ExternalFileName
)

parameters.name: Feature
parameters.description: Array of size NumRefs containing the names of features that include auxiliary external references

parameters.name: ExternalFileName
parameters.description: Array of size NumRefs containing the names of the auxiliary external files

remarks:
Call
IModelDoc2::ListAuxiliaryExtenalFileReferencesCount
before calling of this method to determine the size of the arrays.
